H0.text: In which city did Dylan Thomas die. London

H1.text: In which city did Dylan Thomas die. Cardiff

H2.text: In which city did Dylan Thomas die. Oxford

H3.text: In which city did Dylan Thomas die. Ny

A4.text: During his fourth trip to New York in 1953, Thomas became gravely ill and fell into a coma.

A5.text: He died on 9 November, and his body was returned to Wales.
